title: Unknown Virgin and Child-attribute to R. Campin

content.question: The painting shown can be attributed to the workshop of Robert Campin because of which of the following characteristics?

choices.label: The use of classicizing architectural elements to decorate the interior
The use of atmospheric perspective to create a sense of spatial illusionism
The presentation of holy figures within a contemporary interior
The use of registers to divide different scenes within the composition

content.answer: The presentation of holy figures within a contemporary interior

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Justify an attribution of a work of art by explaining similarities with work by a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
